md:
giải nghĩa từ "bts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* BTS: (noun) abbreviation for "Behind The Scenes", refers to the parts of a movie, play, or other performance that are not seen by the audience, such as the preparation, rehearsals, and backstage activities.

Tiếng Việt: Phía sau cảnh quay (noun)

* Ví dụ: "The BTS footage of the movie showed the actors rehearsing their lines."

* BTS: (noun) abbreviation for "Bulletproof Boy Scouts", refers to a South Korean boy band formed by Big Hit Entertainment.

Tiếng Việt: Đội quân thiếu niên chống đạn (noun)

* Ví dụ: "I'm a huge fan of BTS and have been following their music since their debut."

* BTS: (abbreviation) abbreviation for "Better Than Sorry", used in informal communication, such as text messages or social media.

Tiếng Việt: Tốt hơn là xin lỗi (abbreviation)

* Ví dụ: "I'm so sorry for what I did, BTS."

Từ liên quan: behind, scene, movie, play, performance, backstage, rehearsal, footage, actor, line, boy band, music, debut, sorry, apologize.

giải nghĩa từ "bts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • BTS: (noun) abbreviation for "Behind The Scenes", refers to the parts of a movie, play, or other performance that are not seen by the audience, such as the preparation, rehearsals, and backstage activities.

Tiếng Việt: Phía sau cảnh quay (noun)

  • Ví dụ: "The BTS footage of the movie showed the actors rehearsing their lines."

  • BTS: (noun) abbreviation for "Bulletproof Boy Scouts", refers to a South Korean boy band formed by Big Hit Entertainment.

Tiếng Việt: Đội quân thiếu niên chống đạn (noun)

  • Ví dụ: "I'm a huge fan of BTS and have been following their music since their debut."

  • BTS: (abbreviation) abbreviation for "Better Than Sorry", used in informal communication, such as text messages or social media.

Tiếng Việt: Tốt hơn là xin lỗi (abbreviation)

  • Ví dụ: "I'm so sorry for what I did, BTS."

Từ liên quan: behind, scene, movie, play, performance, backstage, rehearsal, footage, actor, line, boy band, music, debut, sorry, apologize.
